description:
The worst thing about so-called climate initiatives is that they somehow always tax people into oblivion for doing things as common as breathing. This is why Trump slammed Gov. Kathy Hochul’s $9 NYC congestion pricing for reasons that these people will never be able to logically explain.

Trump slams Hochul move to revive NYC congestion tax: ‘It will hurt workers, families, and businesses’ https://t.co/FRxFpTlWoX pic.twitter.com/X2LKyzLUTG
— New York Post Metro (@nypmetro) November 14, 2024
title: “It'll hurt workers, families, and businesses:” Trump blasts NY's latest anti-middle class tax hike

description:
If you are so emotionally weak that you cannot refrain from posting violent threats towards people you politically disagree with, that is definitely a sign you should not be teaching the next generation. This is why Annie Dunleavy was forced to resign after posting a video where she threatened to kill Trump supporters.

And of course, these people are consumed by their victim mentality and she started crying during an interview.

NEW: Connecticut teacher starts bawling on air after she was forced to resign for threatening to k*ll Trump supporters.

Annie Dunleavy says her threats are just one big misunderstanding.

"Please don't test your gangster on me because you'll end on a stretcher gone forever,"… pic.twitte
title: Teacher LOSES IT during interview after resigning over her violent threats toward Trump voters

description:
There is probably no group that has caused more terror for Americans than the cartels. This is why it is odd that our government has yet to label them as a terrorist organization and implement policies that benefit them in some of the most evil ways.

🚨TOM HOMAN: "The cartels are like a Fortune 500 company. The Sinaloa cartel is in over 40 countries around the globe. They're in every major city in the United States. President Trump says he will designate them a terrorist organization. The criminal cartels in Mexico have… pic.twitter.com/kZGAsQV9u3
— Autism Capital 🧩 (@AutismCapital) November 14, 2024
title: Trump's border czar wastes no time: “We will designate the cartels as a terrorist organization”
